title: Nordic Funder Check website
description: Nordic Funder, based in Sweden and established in November 2021, is a CFD proprietary trading firm offering 1 Step, 2 Steps, and 3 Steps program types. The firm supports cTrader, DXTrade, and Match Trader platforms. Nordic Funder uses broker Scandinavian Capital Markets. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: All-in trading: Using all margin/max lot size on one symbol prohibited.
Exploitative strategies: Risking full margin in single trade prohibited.
Evaluation Limits: Only one evaluation of specific account size/plan type active at a time.

payout_policy.details: Profit split: 80% (90% with Add-On). 1-Step Drawdown Lock: Locks to starting balance after 10% profit or withdrawal.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed only between accounts owned by same trader. Third-party/group trading prohibited.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Allowed if personally owned. Third-party/shared EAs prohibited.
firm_rules.news_trading: Allowed to hold existing positions. Opening new position 3 mins before/after prohibited (profit deduction/termination).
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Crypto: Restricted, close by 15:45 EST Friday (unless Add-On purchased).
forbidden_strategies: All-in trading: Using all margin/max lot size on one symbol prohibited.
Exploitative strategies: Risking full margin in single trade prohibited.
Evaluation Limits: Only one evaluation of specific account size/plan type active at a time.

seo_content:
Nordic Funder Technical Infrastructure

Nordic Funder, based in Sweden and established in November 2021, is a CFD proprietary trading firm offering 1 Step, 2 Steps, and 3 Steps program types. The firm supports cTrader, DXTrade, and Match Trader platforms. Nordic Funder uses broker Scandinavian Capital Markets. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
